title: Clairol Shimmer Lights Shampoo Blonde & Silver 31.5oz
description: Clairol Shimmer Lights Original Conditioning Shampoo brightens white and gray hair. Shampoos away yellow, and refreshes faded highlights.

title: Revlon Colorsilk Haircolor, Brown Black, 1-Count (Pack of 3)
description: Revlon Colorsilk Radiant, long-lasting color. Leaves hair in better condition.Revlon Colorsilk gives you natural-looking, even color from root to tip that stays beautiful between colorings. It is formulated to penetrate every strand with its gentle, ammonia-free formula and after-color conditioner with nourishing silk proteins. Hair looks silkier, shinier and healthier than before you colored. 100% gray coverage. Leaves hair in better condition. Available in a range of 40 brilliant shades*Colorsilk permanent haircolor can be used on natural, color-treated, relaxed or permed hair. TIPS:Create silky, shiny haircolorWatch the Revlon ColorSilk how-to video to learn how easy it is to get natural-looking, even color from root to tip.
